pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, March 26, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, March 26, 2017:

Montreal, Quebec

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a doxology at the Evangelismos Tis Theotokou Church.

  • Closed to media

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Greek Independence Day Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Parade begins on the corner of Jean-Talon and Hutchison streets
